metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12392 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The 'Copy as cURL' feature of Devtools' network tab did not properly escape the HTTP POST data of a request, which can be controlled by the website. If a user used the 'Copy as cURL' feature and pasted the command into a terminal, it could have resulted in the disclosure of local files. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.8, Firefox < 76, and Thunderbird < 68.8.0.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '76.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:68.8.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
